It's strange looking back at this with knowledge that Fairy Tail is over. And even though Fairy Tail wasn't really all that good with the problems with power escalation, wonky metaphysics, the use of the whole "power of friendship" way too may times, overpowered main characters and dumb as hell fanservice, people still liked it.

It was still popular and there were people who stood by Mashima even when the story kept getting more and more ridiculous. Which is something I can't say for BLEACH, considering how everyone jumped ship once they finally had enough.
